InstallationÂ¶

Requirements
Python2.7 Numpy 1.7.1 Pandas 0.14.0 Openpyxl 1.8.6 Testfixtures 3.0.2

Install Python2.7 and the four dependencies. The source code can be found at https://github.com/umich-brcf-bioinf/ExomeSeqPipeline.
